name: InstanceOfRecordLinkage
title: NFDI4Health Module Record Linkage Metadataschema (UC 5.3) V3.3

item.text: Indication whether there are specific regulations/permissions for record linkage.
Information specifying which specific legal basis allows for record linkage.
Indication whether an informed consent that allows record linkage has been obtained.
Institutions and authorities that must agree to the record linkage.
Indication whether there are additional costs for record linkage.
Identifiers that can be used for record linkage (e.g. names, date of birth, zip code, insurance number or control number as in cancer registries).
Additional important details for conducting record linkage.
DOIs of additional related resources specific to record linkage (e.g., publications).
